One_Grung_Above.name: Grung
One_Grung_Above.alignment: Most grungs are lawful, having been raised in a strict caste system. They tend toward evil as well, coming from a culture where social advancement occurs rarely, and most often because another member of your army has died and there is no one else of that caste to fill the vacancy.
One_Grung_Above.age: Grungs mature to adulthood in a single year, but have been known to live up to 50 years.
One_Grung_Above.size_description: Grungs stand between 2 1⁄2 and 3 1⁄2 feet tall and average about 30 pounds.
One_Grung_Above.languages_desc: You can speak, read, and write Grung.

Locathah_Rising.name: Locathat
Locathah_Rising.alignment: Most locathah are true neutral or have some aspect of neutrality in their alignment. They tend toward good, coming from a culture where compassion for the downtrodden is a commonality.
Locathah_Rising.age: Age. Grungs mature to adulthood in a single year, but have been known to live up to 50 years.
Locathah_Rising.size_description: Locathah stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.
Locathah_Rising.languages_desc: You can speak, read, and write Aquan and Common.

Acquisitions_Incorporated.name: Verdan
Acquisitions_Incorporated.alignment: Verdan are generally good, although their absence of racial identity and shared history can sometimes see individual verdan become untethered from any moral or ethical framework.
Acquisitions_Incorporated.age: Verdan reach adulthood at around the age of 24, and it is thought that they might live to nearly 200 years old. However, because no verdan has died of old age since the race's initial creation, their upper age limits remain subject to speculation.
Acquisitions_Incorporated.languages_desc: You speak, read, and write Common, Goblin, and one additional language of your choice. This language typically has some connection to one of the areas or cultures that has been part of your life.

The_Tortle_Package.name: Tortle
The_Tortle_Package.alignment: Tortles tend to lead orderly, ritualistic live. They develop customs and routines, becoming more set in their ways as they age. Most are lawful good. A few can be selfish and greedy, tending more toward evil, but it's unusual for a tortle to shuck off order in favor of chaos.
The_Tortle_Package.age: Young tortles tend to crawl for a few weeks after birth before learning to walk on two legs. They reach average adulthood by the age of 15 and live an average of 50 years.
The_Tortle_Package.size_description: Tortle adults stand 5 and 6 feet tall and average 450 pounds. Their shells account for roughly one-third of their weight.
The_Tortle_Package.languages_desc: You speak, read, and write Aquan and Common.

Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.name: Changeling
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.alignment: Changelings tend toward pragmatic neutrality, and few changelings embrace evil.
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.age: Changelings mature slightly faster than humans but share a similar lifespan-typically a century or less. While a changeling can transform to conceal their age, the effects of aging affect them similarly to humans.
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.size_description: Your size is Medium. To set your height and weight randomly, start with rolling a size modifier: Size modifier = 2d4 Height = 5 feet + l inch + your size modifier in inches Weight in pounds = 115 + (2d4 x your size modifier)
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.languages_desc: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.name: Goblin
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.alignment: In Eberron, goblins are usually neutral. They tend to look out for themselves, preferably without drawing unwanted attention from any larger, more powerful people.
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.age: Goblins reach adulthood a t age 8 and live up to 60 years.
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.size_description: Your size is Small. To set your height and weight randomly, start with rolling a size modifier: Size modifier = 2d4 Height = 3 feet + 5 inches + your size modifier in inches Weight i n pounds = 35 + your size modifier
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.languages_desc: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

subraces.name: Bugbear
subraces.alignment: Bugbears live on the fringes of society even in Darguun, where they value self-sufficiency and violence. They are generally chaotic, organizing in loose tribes under charismatic and powerful leaders.
subraces.age: Bugbears reach adulthood a t age 16 and live up to 80 years.
subraces.size_desc: To set your height and weight randomly, start with rolling a size modifier: Size modifier = 2dl 2 Height = 6 feet + your size modifier in inches Weight in pounds = 200 + (2d6 x your size modifier)
subraces.language_desc: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

subraces.name: Hobgoblin
subraces.alignment: Hobgoblin society in Eberron is shaped by the ideal of a strict code of honor and rigid martial discipline. Most hobgoblins are lawful, tending toward harsh enforcement of their laws.
subraces.age: Hobgoblins mature at the same rate as humans and have lifespans similar in length to theirs.
subraces.size_desc: Your size is Medium. To set your height and weight randomly, start with rolling a size modifier: Size modifier = 2dl0 Height = 4 feet + 8 inches + your size modifier in inches Weight in pounds = 1 1 0 + (2d4 x your size modifier).
subraces.language_desc: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.name: Kalashtar
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.alignment: The noble spirit tied to a kalashtar drives it toward lawful and good behavior. Most kalashtar combine strong self-discipline with compassion for all beings, but some kalashtar resist the virtuous influence of their spirit.
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.age: Kalashtar mature and age a t the same rate as humans.
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.size_description: Your size is Medium. To set your height and weight randomly, start with rolling a size modifier: Size modifier = 2d6 Height = 5 feet + 4 inch + your size modifier in inches Weight in pounds = 110 + (1d6 x your size modifier)
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.languages_desc: You can speak, read, and write Common, Quori,and one other languages of your choice.

Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.name: Kalashtar
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.alignment: The noble spirit tied to a kalashtar drives it toward lawful and good behavior. Most kalashtar combine strong self-discipline with compassion for all beings, but some kalashtar resist the virtuous influence of their spirit.
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.age: Kalashtar mature and age a t the same rate as humans.
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.size_description: Your size is Medium. To set your height and weight randomly, start with rolling a size modifier: Size modifier = 2d6 Height = 5 feet + 4 inch + your size modifier in inches Weight in pounds = 110 + (1d6 x your size modifier)
Eberron_Rising_From_The_Last_War.languages_desc: You can speak, read, and write Common, Quori,and one other languages of your choice.
